item.title: Node setup
item.description: This is a guide to help lab assistants setup a local JavaScript environment. Step 1 – Add Node.js PPA sudo apt-get install curl curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_13.x | sudo -E bash - Or sudo apt-get install curl curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_12.x | sudo -E bash - Step 2 – Install Node.js on Ubuntu sudo apt-get install nodejs Step 3 – Check Node.js and NPM Version After installing node.js verify and check the installed version.
